name: Storyist Application Theme File
summary: Learn about .STORYISTTHEME files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: STORYISTTHEME files are saved to the following directory: [user]/​Library/​Application Support/​Storyist/​Themes/​. They are saved in a Mac OS X package format, and they contain a .PLIST file that can be viewed if you right-click on the file and select "Show Package Contents."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
